* "J SC value" (this is an abbreviation for "J-Scott value", which is not a material name)

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| TPD (Thiophene-3-yl-phenylene-1,1-dioxide) |
| P3 (P3-type polymer) |
| PC71BM (Polymer-coated PC71BM) |
| J SC (J-SC value) |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, including any capitalization and punctuation.
